com.effisoft.docindex

Class SimpleFileList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.effisoft.docindex.SimpleFileList

  • public class SimpleFileList
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for storing and processing a flat file list. The list follows the table-of-contents implicit rule: - Element of index 0 is the root node - Any element in list with index i belongs to the node with the greated index small than i.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> _depths
      List of the depths of each item in file tree structure
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> _files
      List of file names (including directories)
      private java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> _isDirectory
      List of booleans: _isDirectory[i] is true iif _files[i] is a directory

        public void addItem(int depth,

        Add an item (file or directory) to the list
        Parameters:

        isDir - (boolean) True id file is a directory
